feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Distribution of AVC-objects
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

How can I distribute AVC objects (such as characteristics, configuration profiles, parts lists) from one public cloud system (test system) to another public cloud system (prod system)? I couldn't find the ALE-transactions (bd91, etc.) or does it seem that ale can only be used for imports in public cloud?!

I would be very grateful for your assistance.

Regards

entry.title: Add the custom field I added to the sales order to the My Inbox application in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I have added a custom field to the sales order header information. The name of this field is YY1_AvansMiktar_SDH. I couldn't find a way to add this field to the General Information tab. Could you please assist me? When I debug with F12, I can see that the custom field is appearing behind My Inbox. Below, I am sharing the code snippet.

Thank you in advance.

I was able to successfully do this for the item.


 

{
  "d": {
    "__metadata": {
      "id": "https://myxxxx.s4hana.cloud.sap:443/sap/opu/odata/sap/SD_F1814_SO_FS_SRV/C_Salesorderfs('316')",

entry.title: Is there anything equivalent to /SCWM/CANCPICK on the Cloud Public Edition?
entry.content:
Hello,

Is there anything like /SCWM/CANCPICK on the Cloud Public? It is an operation to reverse the picking tasks after the reversal of the Post GI.


All the best,

Victor

entry.title: MANAGE REPAYMENT REQUEST APP NOT FOUND
entry.content:
Hi , 

we intend to use the APP Manage Repayment Request  (App IDF5754 )  but we could not find this app or any scope item associated with it.

Could you indicate to us how we can implement this APP in our S/4 Hana Public Cloud ?

At Fiori Library it is written that it is available in public cloud .

thanks and best regards

entry.title: is there any relationship between an account assignment category and a tax code on po?
entry.content:
Hi, I would like to know if there is any relationship between an account assignment category and a tax code on po.

What we did so far is below.

1. We are trying to create a po with a consumable material with the tax code "V3 (10%)" on PIR data.

2. After entering a material on a po item area, the tax code is still V3.

3. After entering an account assignment category (K), the tax code changed from V3 to V1(5%).

We want to set up 10% as a default value when we create PO.

Thank you so much.

entry.title: Down payments for Non-Trade Supplier are not applicable in Manage Down Payment Request Application
entry.content:
HI Sir/Ma'am,

Currently we have two types of suppliers, Trade and Non-Trade.  When processing down payments for Non-Trade Suppliers, we cannot use the application Manage Down Payment Request, only Trade Suppliers.  What could be the reason for this behavior and how can we resolve it or is there a workaround for this?

Thank you and God bless.

Sincerely,

 

Melvin Banggo

entry.title: Make Custom Fields Read Only - S/4Hana Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello there,

In S/4HANA Public Cloud I would like to populate a custom field via API, and in the Fiori app “Manage Sales Orders (Version 2)” I would like to set the field property to “Read-Only” for end users.
Is there a way in S/4HANA Public Cloud to control field properties?

Kind regards,
Philipp

entry.title: CDS view required for Account Account Determination (Table T030) in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

 

In the S/4HANA Public Cloud system, I would like to identify the reporting option or CDS view corresponding to table T030. My objective is to check the configuration of the Automatic Account Determination application. Could you please advise how a mass verification of this setup can be performed?

 

Best regards

entry.title: SAP public cloud RAP Custom action Print pdf
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I added a Print button in the RAP BDEF, and within the logic of that button, I called an Adobe Form template. It has already been sent to the print queue. How can I trigger a direct download from the front end?

 

Thanks advance

entry.title: Service contract determination on service orders
entry.content:
Hello,

I'm using the API Service Order A2X (API_SERVICE_ORDER_SRV) to migrate service orders from external systems to S/4HANA Public Cloud. There are some orders which I don't want to link to service contracts, but if I don't, there'll be errors on the UI.

Is there a way to select if I don't want service contract determination in a specific order?

Thank you, best regards.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: A top level package already exists for the software component ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT
entry.content:
Hello,

I am working in a SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public .

When trying to create a new package from Eclipse, under the software component ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT in order to export it to the Test system later, the system is generating the following error:

A top level package already exists for the software component ZCUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT

I would be grateful for any assistance you can provide.

Thank you, best regards.

entry.title: How to Define Posting Rules-Period Selection field？
entry.content:
Hi！

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/90c07e91c7a64f328be3fd6b48955b13/02f86992dfca4406ad6831f6555b13b8.html

I referred to the documentation and configured YTD during the process, but the actual posting still uses the period value. May I ask where the configuration went wrong?

 

 

 

Best Regards.

thanks advance

entry.content:
Dear Team,

 

I have uploaded budget for G/L and WBS ,
Created service PR and PO , When we try to confirm services higher than budget amount , system is not blocking , we can able to confirm the services.
Please help me to fix this issue.
Regards
Ramesh

entry.title: RF Multi HU Picking
entry.content:
When I have a Warehouse Order to pick 3 HU, the RF is as follows

 

I want to scan the 1st HU and the destination bin and redo the process, but the system wants me to scan the 3 HU before scanning the destination bin.

 

 

 

 

How can I process to have the expected process (scan HU and destination bin for each HU) ?

entry.title: How to change the table define condition after the CDS view is published and used in an Query
entry.content:
Dear Community,

When we published a CDS view, and generated the cube, the analytic cube, and the view, we found there is a requirement to add table join condition fields between 2 data source.

However, since the view is published, system always generates the error message "

Data cannot be created since creation is disabled  /BOBF/FRW_COMMON/106".  

May I know it is possible to change the "Define join conditions" after the view is published?

Or we have to create a new CDS View? Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: I want to output an alerting message for changing the amount on a Purchase Order.
entry.content:
I want to ask about an alerting message for changing the amount on a Purchase Order.

What We did so far are below.

1.  We created a purchase order on a public cloud.

2. The po data is integrated to the business network.

3. We created an order confirmation and advanced ship notice orders.

4. We changed the amount on a po that we already created.

in this case, the amount of an item on s/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition and Business network is different because the change of amount is not integrated to the business network.

So, we want to show the message that means like " the amount of items on public cloud and business network are different".

Experts, would you tell me the way we output this message on a screen?

entry.title: Launching My Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
The Missing Link: Launching My Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud
Hi everyone,

I've just built an RAP application using Eclipse ADT and then generated the SAPUI5 app from the service binding in VS Code. After successfully deploying it to my S/4HANA Public Cloud environment, I want to create a launchpad tile to access the app.

I created a custom tile using the URL generated from the deployment, but I'm stuck trying to associate it with a business catalog. When I try to add it, the system only allows me to select standard business catalogs, not my custom Z catalog.

Is this the right way to create a launchpad tile for a custom app in the public cloud? Has anyone else faced this problem and found a solution? Any help or advice would be greatly appreciated!

Kind Regards,

Marcelo Romeiro

entry.title: Issue with Creating External Number Ranges in S/4HANA Cloud Customizing System
entry.content:
Hello Community,

When maintaining number ranges for SD documents in S/4HANA Cloud, I was able to create external intervals such as G001–G999 in a Starter System.

However, when trying the same in a Customizing System, the system throws the error:

  • “Interval XX: Specify numeric interval limits” (Message No. NR560)

Has anyone experienced this difference? Why does it work in Starter but not in Customizing, and what is the correct way to achieve an external number range with a prefix like G in S/4HANA Cloud?

Thanks in advance!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Inventory Count - Posting only possible in periods 2025/09 and 2025/08 in company code 0001
entry.content:
Hello there Sap, 

at 29.08 we counted our inventory. (Physically not in SAP)

Today (01.09.25) i want to post the Inventory differences in the SAP System for the Date 29.08 = Posting Date

When i do i get the error message: 

 

A difference can only be posted for period 09 2025

Diagnosis

The first count was posted for this physical inventory document in the period 09 2025. The differences must likewise be posted in this period.

 

When i create a new Inventory Document i also get this Message: 

 

Posting only possible in periods 2025/09 and 2025/08 in company code 0001

Diagnosis

The posting date entered is not within one of the permitted posting periods (current period/previous period).

This can be due to one of two reasons:

  • The correct current period has not been set in the system.
    For the system, the first of the entered periods is the current period. At the beginning of a new period, your systems administrator must change the current period in the material master record, using the function "Shift periods". This has not yet been done.
  • You have entered a wrong date in the field "Posting date".

    Procedure

    Check the posting date and correct it if necessary. If your input is correct, inform your systems administrator that the "period shifting" (period-end closing) process has not yet been completed.

    Message no. M7053

     

    Procedure

    Change the posting date so that the differences can be posted in posting period 09 2025.

    Message no. M7734

     Problem: Counting date is set to today at all times. I cannot influence that. 

    any ideas? 

    kind regards, 

    Philipp

entry.title: Why is Automatic Picking Not Triggered for Return Deliveries in S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
We observed that automatic picking is not being triggered for return deliveries in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. Even though the "Automatic Picking" checkbox is enabled for the shipping point, the picked quantity remains zero upon return delivery creation.

We've confirmed that:
- The return delivery type (e.g., LR2) is used.
- The item category (e.g., RENV) is relevant for picking.
- Shipping point config has "Automatic Picking" enabled.
- This is a non-WM scenario.
  
Is this standard system behavior, and if so, what is the recommended approach for streamlining picking in return deliveries?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
